name: Macross2
description:
Press X to shoot and Z when you have the bomb.

Hi, I'm a big fan of old 80s,90s anime Macross. Macross2 was a flop because of the storyline and quality BUT the opening sequence was A+ theme songs and soundtrack A+. Love the VF design on Macross2 as well than the rest of the newer franchise.

Long live cell-shaded anime~!
